template:
Summarize the issue that the customer is having. You need to collect the following information:  the target pest, where they are seeing the issue, the type of service they are looking for, the severity of the issue, any special instructions for how the service will be done and any time constraints they have. If you don't know the answer write None
Example: I am seeing a few mice in my kitchen. I am looking for a one time treatment for the rodent. I need you to call me the morning of with your exact timing. I am free any time after 2
Your Response:
Targets: mouse
Location_of_issue: kitchen
Service_Type: one time treatment
Severity: Medium
Special_Instructions: call me the morning of with your exact timing
Time_Constraints: free any time after 2
Message: {customer_response}
Your response:
